page.title: 03BRIGHSTONE TEA GARDENS
page.content: Near the centre of Brighstone village are the tea gardens,a popular tourist attraction with its own car park big enough for four or five coaches at one time! When you have taken your seats a waitress comes and takes your order for refreshments. We asked some customers some questions.These are shown below with the most common answers. { Where are you from?}West Midlands { Who are you with?}A coach party of friends. { Have you brought your car? }No. { Where are you staying? }Shanklin. { Have you come here before? }No. { Will you buy souvenirs here at the {tea gardens in their little shop? }Yes but everything is rather expensive for pensioners.
